title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama completions into any channel via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (Windows/Mac/Linux).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for offline testing.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate workflows without code.

title: ollama-cli-completions
summary: Shell completion scripts (bash/zsh/fish) for the ollama CLI.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of Modelfile definitions maintained by Ollama (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, etc.).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or standalone scripts.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, and embeddings with async iterators.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by a local Ollama model.
